name: ‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎Paint Rogue (Demo)
description:
Description:

  • Paint Rogue is an action platformer with randomly generated levels and permanent death. Use your paint gun to rocket across levels and target and destroy enemies. The final game will include a world map, cute pets and destructive power-ups. Making this game is possible with your support. Thanks!

Cheats: 

  • F11/F12 will move you across levels.

Credits:

  • Developed by HermitPal
  • Art by Craftpix
  • Voiced by Sean Lenhart, Alex Bordie, Ian Lampert, Meghan Christian
